name: Bandit Sniper's Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: No Reward
description: You have acquired the maximum amount of Magnetite Shards this week.

name: Ghostly Infusion
description: Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. Infuses armor with a spiritual aura.

description: Can be used to capture Auric energy from Tarir, the Forgotten City.
